name: Gamzee Pesterquest Fanroute
description:
BIG TRIGGER WARNING: self harm, abuse mention, parental abuse, neglect, depression, mental illness in general

The Gamzee route is here! It took me quite some time to figure out who to tackle next but Gamzee's route was drafted honestly by surprise. I spent some time in inpatient care for mental health very recently. As Gamzee is a coping character to me, I soon found my journaling exercises were a real muse for writing this. It's been important to me, to the point I revised it multiple times, typed it up and put it in a presentable route.

My goal is to target another facet of Gamzee that people may not think about, especially people who don't have the sort of thoughts that mentally ill people may have. I wanted to acknowledge his parental neglect, and show his emotions from that.
